name: tragic dreams of a dead hiker
name_original: tragic dreams of a dead hiker
description:
---------------------------------------------------------

- HELLO EMPLOYEE [GBR-86] -

YOUR CASE TODAY IS [Todd Bankley] AS USUAL, PLEASE NOTE [locations/events] OF IMPORTANCE DOWN AND TRY TO MAKE A VALID TIMELINE THAT IS WITH THE CASE FILE PROVIDED BELOW

ALSO OF NOTE: THE SUBJECT WAS REPORTEDLY LAST SEEN WITH THEIR 13 YEAR OLD SON [Philip Bankley]. PLEASE TRY TO DEDUCT WHAT MIGHT HAVE HAPPENED TO THEM TOO.

YOUR [Dream-Vega-6] WILL BE PROVIDED TO YOU SHORTLY BY THE MEANS OF PNEUMATIC DELIVERY.  IF YOU BELIEVE THAT THE BODY OR THE MIND IS TOO DAMAGED TO THE POINT OF [soul death] , PLEASE CONTACT HR.

GOOD LUCK AND MAY THE ETERNAL ONES BLESS YOU.

---------------------------------------------------------

This is a game I made for a uni assignment! We weren't allowed to use ANY original assets and make a game themed around exploration, so I made a game where you explore the truly tragic dreams of a dead hiker and figure out what happened to him and his son. Its very simple but I hope you enjoy it!

---------------------------------------------------------

LIST OF ASSETS 

  • Kenney survival kit
  • Retro Camera
  • Low Poly Nature
  • Low Poly Particle Pack
  • Skybox Extended
  • Modular First Person Controller

---------------------------------------------------------

If you liked this, consider checking out my other projects or following me on twitter!
